ul.title: This is your characters page. Here you can:
ul.item2: edit the character's level after creation;
ul.item3: if you have more than one character — change their order in the collection;
ul.item4: join clan wars with a single click.
ul.item5: add characters to the gallery, after moderation they will appear in the gallery;
ul.note: If something is unclear, you can read the guide.

page.notChars: You don’t have any characters yet
page.galleryEmpty: No characters have been added to the gallery yet

clansPage.create: This is the clans page. Here you can create your own clan:
clansPage.note: note that one character can be the leader of only one clan and only on their own server;
clansPage.info: you can also view information about any clan by clicking the “Information” button;
clansPage.delete: only the clan leader can delete their clan.
clansPage.clanInfoNotAdded: Clan information has not been added yet.

yup.minName: Name must be at least 3 characters
yup.maxName: Name must be at most 16 characters
yup.maxEmail: Email must be at most 128 characters
yup.minPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters
yup.maxPassword: Password must be at most 64 characters

form.textRegister: Fill out the form to join the Party Pulse Portal and be able to participate in the GVG activity
form.textLogin: Now log in to the portal to add your game character and start joining in clan GVGs

form.pathThree: If you already have an account, please
form.descriptionForgot: Enter your email address. If this email is registered, you will receive a message with instructions to securely reset your password

form.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this character?
form.deleteClanDescription: Do you really want to delete this clan?
form.clanJoinInfo: To join the clan, select a character, click 'Join', and wait for the clan master's approval.
form.leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the character from the clan?
